<Text: Tashkopryu Mosque:  It is currently the third mosque in Plovdiv which is in good condition after Dzhumaya Mosque and Imaret Mosque.>
Triplets:<Tashkopryu Mosque

--------------------
Text: Tashkopryu Mosque:  It is currently inactive despite efforts and demands, mainly by Turks of Bulgaria, to give active status for it.
Triplets:<Tashkopryu Mosque
